title: CALCULATION OF MAXIMUM STRING CURRENT
fullText:
The value of ISTRING MAX depends on the PV system configuration, and is calculated as follows:
(a) String containing no DCUs:
ISTRING MAX = 1.25 x KI x ISC MOD
NOTE 1 See Appendix J for the determination of KI.
(b) Strings containing partial DCUs:
The greater of the following:
ISTRING MAX = IDCU string max
or
ISTRING MAX = 1.25 x KI x ISC MOD
(c) Strings with DCUs on all modules:
ISTRING MAX = IDCU string max
NOTE 2: See Clause 1.4 for notations.
